original_text: And they had a few small fish. And having blessed them, he said that these also should be set before them.
korean_text: 또 작은 생선 두어 마리가 있는지라 이에 축복하시고 명하사 이것도 나누어 주게 하시니

sentences.original_text: And they had a few small fish.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게는 작은 생선 두어 마리가 있었다.

sentences.original_text: that these also should be set before them.
